revision.text:
-------------------------------------- Welcome to the Main Page of the Pokéclicker Wiki! -------------------------------------- When editing this page, please note a few things: * The inexperienced may want to check out the "How to help" section on the "community portal" article linked on the sidebar. * Remember this page is the most public face of the wiki - test edits are best done on a [[Test Page|separate page]]. * Sections within "" markers (without the spaces) - like this entire section - are hidden comments, and can be separated by several lines. Be sure not to break them. ------------------------------------------- The Main Page design code follows. Edit me! ------------------------------------------- -->
[[File:Welcome to the.png|link=Project:Community Portal|210px|Welcome]][[File:Blank.png|9px|link=]]
[[File:PokeClickerLogo.png|link=Project:About|300px|Pokéclicker Wiki]]
[[File:Wiki_Custom.png|link=|80px]]
[[File:PC_E.png|80px|left|link=]][[File:PC_E.png|right|80px|link=]] A community-driven wiki focusing on [[PokéClicker|Pokéclicker]] that [[Meta:Autoconfirmed_users|anyone with a confirmed Miraheze account]] can [[Help:Editing|edit]].
Today is {{CURRENTDAYNAME}} {{CURRENTMONTHNAME}} {{CURRENTDAY}}, {{CURRENTYEAR}} at {{CURRENTTIME}}.
The wiki currently has [[Special:Statistics|'''{{NUMBEROFARTICLES}}''']] [[Special:Allpages|articles]] since May 31, 2008.
There is a total of {{NUMBEROFACTIVEUSERS}} active users this month.
Note: Auto-Confirmed accounts are those that have both existed for 4 days and edited pages 10 times. Contact the Wiki Moderators for more information. ---- [[Wikia:Help:How_to_create_a_great_guide_or_tutorial|Wiki tutorial]]{{·}} [[:Category:Help|Help pages]]{{·}} [https://discord.gg/a6DFe4p Discord]{{·}} [[PokéClicker Wiki:Directory|Directory]]
[[PokéClicker Wiki:Ruleset|Ruleset and guidelines]]{{·}} [[Special:SpecialPages|Special pages]]{{·}} [[Special:Categories|Categories]]{{·}} [[Special:Preferences|Preferences]]{{·}} [[Help:FAQ|FAQ]] ----

Pokéclicker is an open source game built around the story and content of the Pokémon games. This is an incremental/clicker type game that is currently in the beta release phase. New content and patches are released frequently.

----

Pokémon is the sole property of The Pokémon Company, and we do not claim any ownership of its title.

---- You can start browsing this wiki by scrolling below and clicking on any of the links. The [[PokéClicker Wiki:Directory|Directory]] is a great place to start as well. == '''Maps & Navigation''' == {| class="wikitable" style="margin: auto;" ! [[Regions]] [[File:Town map.png|20px]] !! Meet the [[Pokéclicker Team]]! [[File:RedSparr0w avatar.png|50px]]

'''Didn't find the page you were looking for? try looking at this list of all [[Special:Statistics|'''{{NUMBEROFARTICLES}}''']] [[Special:AllPages|pages]]''' This wiki is community managed, but we do try to keep a [[To-Do list]] of what is missing or needs updating on this wiki. Please let us know on [https://discord.gg/a6DFe4p Discord] if you see anything that needs updating on a page or simply add it in the To-Do list. Thank you.
{{Wiki Contributors}}
